title: Jihyeon Bae
text:
Welcome! I am Jihyeon Bae, Ph.D.Â Candidate in the Department of Political Science at the University of Washington (UW). My dissertation examines international law and organizations used by authoritarian state leaders.

title: Software
text:
I was fortunate to be part of a fantastic team for the â€˜â€™Data Science for Social Goodâ€™â€™ program in summer 2024. We developed an R package GeoNdxR that allows R users to build user-interactive website (water reuse index as an example)for index creation using their own geospatial data of interest, without any designated server.
